vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 19983, passed by the Dallas City Council on June 8, 1988; (1) by deleting the city manager’s proposals for improvement of the police department; (2) providing a savings clause; (3) providing a severability clause; and (4) providing an effective date - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
